title: Shrapnel turret
summary: Small Turrets can only be equipped onto ships with S Turret Slots. Small ships such as Badger, Aurora, or Bison do not have S turret slots and cannot have S-turrets equipped. For the small autoturrets that some small ships have, see PDT.
full_text:
Shrapnel turret
Small Turrets can only be equipped onto ships with S Turret Slots. Small ships such as Badger, Aurora, or Bison do not have S turret slots and cannot have S-turrets equipped. For the small autoturrets that some small ships have, see PDT.
Shrapnel Turret (Small)
Shrapnel turrets are kinetic turret similar to a real-life shotgun. They are unique in that they fire 5 projectiles in a spread pattern.
It is best used for close-range engagements against warships. In large quantities, it can also produce a screen of projectiles useful for keeping away fighters.
Shrapnel turrets come in Tier 1, Tier 2, Tier 3, and an Exotic variant. The Shrapnel turret's only Exotic variant is Dread. Dread Shrapnel turrets must be crafted from scrap, a Tier 3 Shrapnel turret, and a Dread Shrapnel blueprint, obtained from Dread Pirates and Pirate Dens.
Shrapnel does not have a Medium variant.
Manufacturing
The manufacturing costs for each Shrapnel variant are listed as follows:
Shrapnel (Small)
Tier 1
80 Korrelite, 60 Reknite, 40 Gellium
Tier 2
40 Axnit, 20 Narcor, Shrapnel I
Tier 3
20 Red Narcor, Shrapnel II
Dread
100 Metal scraps, 10 Power cell, Shrapnel III, Dread Shrapnel blueprint
